ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Short-break from EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: *drools* You on Baja right? *excited* Wilson ... From: LKW  ... going
ygData.messageBody:
*drools*
You on Baja right?
*excited*

Wilson

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>

> Yeah, UO now have LOTS and LOTS of changes, giving players more controls
> over their chars (eg it's now possible to make 7gms char as u can decide
> which skills to lock, which to rise, which to drop etc).
>
> The new land is coming out, it's a mirror image of the existing land but
> pvp- (ie no pking). Everyone gonna have enuff place to put their houses
> (of coz in time to come, land will get scare again but this time they
going
> to implement 1 house per acct per shard).
>
> Lots of exciting changes now, plus a party system coming up. UO has learn
> alot from EQ and given the fact that it has more RP elements than EQ, I
> believe it's gonna rock!
